Name: ALONE
About the game: ALONE is a horror adventure game. You have to help a guy named Yeongchul trapped inside his home, navigate the house to protect himself from suspicious person. Synopsis Yeongchul returns from work as always. He had a girlfriend named Euna. He returned home, blaming himself for not often caring about her girlfriend because of overtime. But when Yeongchul returns home, he faces a terrible event he couldn't even imagine.
